name: Shooting Masters Physics Games
description:
Start with only one FUNNY rule --NO RULES: Roll over in ragdoll Physics style game! Challenge your Friends with a Sniper gun on a Single Phone!

***Tap to shoot***An addictive Shooting Masters Physics Games. Aim at the enemy to kill your opponents. Play with all funny characters! Download now...

Shooting for Just FUN! A brand new funny shooting game has come in store for you!

-New and arcade shooting games just like ragdoll fun
-Super cool Gun Masters to challenge your friends
-Play with all the funny characters! Shooting has never end

ONLY ONE AIM: JUMP, FLIP & SHOOT TO WIN – LET THE FUN BEGIN…

HOW TO PLAY
Tap the jump button to jump. Hold Fire button to set angel, & Release fire button to shoot your funny ragdoll opponents. Tap tap fast for fast shooting, Wow what a LOL Shooting Games!

GAME FEATURES::
*Awesome funny characters to choose from
*Flipping Guns to choose from
*Super-duper gun masters to play funny sniper games
*Smooth button games with jumping controls
*Wacky action sniper gameplay
*Two Modes: One Player and Two Players
*Challenge your funny friends to beat them

DOWNLOAD NOW !!!!

Enjoy with Shooting Masters Physics Games. Beat your friends in amazing ragdoll Physics games. Do take this Challenge? Don’t miss out on the fun game! Be the first to grab the Shooting Masters…
